comment: If you live in Naarm, I went to Inner North Medical on Lygon Street (as a new patient to the practice) + loved it. They do AZ shots in the morning and Pfizer in the arvo, so if you make a GP appointment for pm any day you might sneak in with the leftover AZ like I did.
